1.definition: to submit (as a document) to a court or officer in the course of proceedingsto present or offer officially or in legal form

1 a.definition: a document or object produced and identified in court as evidence

sub_terms.b: a document labeled with an identifying mark (as a number or letter) and appended to a writing (as a brief) to which it is relevant

3.definition: an act or instance of exhibiting
